optimization.tuning.pso_hyperparameter_optimizer¶

Source: src\optimization\tuning\pso_hyperparameter_optimizer.py

Module Overview¶

Advanced PSO Hyperparameter Optimization for Factory-Generated Controllers.

This module provides sophisticated hyperparameter optimization for PSO algorithms specifically tuned for factory-generated SMC controllers. Features include adaptive parameter adjustment, multi-objective optimization, and controller-specific tuning.

Key Features:

  • Adaptive PSO hyperparameter optimization

  • Controller-specific parameter tuning

  • Multi-objective optimization (convergence speed vs quality)

  • Population dynamics optimization

  • Real-time parameter adaptation

  • Performance-driven hyperparameter selection

Complete Source Code¶

  1#======================================================================================\\\
  2#============== src/optimization/tuning/pso_hyperparameter_optimizer.py ===============\\\
  3#======================================================================================\\\
  4
  5"""
  6Advanced PSO Hyperparameter Optimization for Factory-Generated Controllers.
  7
  8This module provides sophisticated hyperparameter optimization for PSO algorithms
  9specifically tuned for factory-generated SMC controllers. Features include adaptive
 10parameter adjustment, multi-objective optimization, and controller-specific tuning.
 11
 12Key Features:
 13- Adaptive PSO hyperparameter optimization
 14- Controller-specific parameter tuning
 15- Multi-objective optimization (convergence speed vs quality)
 16- Population dynamics optimization
 17- Real-time parameter adaptation
 18- Performance-driven hyperparameter selection
 19"""
 20
 21import numpy as np
 22import logging
 23from typing import Dict, List, Tuple, Any, Callable
 24from dataclasses import dataclass
 25from enum import Enum
 26import time
 27import json
 28from scipy.optimize import differential_evolution, minimize
 29import warnings
 30
 31from src.controllers.factory import SMCType, create_smc_for_pso
 32from src.optimization.algorithms.pso_optimizer import PSOTuner
 33from src.config import load_config
 34from src.utils.seed import set_global_seed
 35
 36warnings.filterwarnings("ignore", category=RuntimeWarning)
 37
 38
 39class OptimizationObjective(Enum):
 40    """PSO optimization objectives."""
 41    CONVERGENCE_SPEED = "convergence_speed"
 42    SOLUTION_QUALITY = "solution_quality"
 43    ROBUSTNESS = "robustness"
 44    EFFICIENCY = "efficiency"
 45    MULTI_OBJECTIVE = "multi_objective"
 46
 47
 48class PSOParameterType(Enum):
 49    """Types of PSO parameters to optimize."""
 50    POPULATION_SIZE = "population_size"
 51    INERTIA_WEIGHT = "inertia_weight"
 52    COGNITIVE_COEFFICIENT = "cognitive_coefficient"
 53    SOCIAL_COEFFICIENT = "social_coefficient"
 54    VELOCITY_CLAMP = "velocity_clamp"
 55    CONVERGENCE_THRESHOLD = "convergence_threshold"
 56    MAX_ITERATIONS = "max_iterations"
 57
 58
 59@dataclass
 60class PSOHyperparameters:
 61    """PSO hyperparameter configuration."""
 62    population_size: int = 20
 63    inertia_weight: float = 0.729
 64    cognitive_coefficient: float = 1.49445
 65    social_coefficient: float = 1.49445
 66    velocity_clamp_factor: float = 0.5
 67    convergence_threshold: float = 1e-6
 68    max_iterations: int = 100
 69
 70    # Advanced parameters
 71    adaptive_inertia: bool = True
 72    inertia_decay_rate: float = 0.99
 73    velocity_clamping: bool = True
 74    restart_threshold: int = 20
 75    diversity_threshold: float = 1e-3
 76
 77    # Performance weights
 78    convergence_weight: float = 0.6
 79    quality_weight: float = 0.4
 80
 81
 82@dataclass
 83class OptimizationResult:
 84    """Result of hyperparameter optimization."""
 85    optimized_parameters: PSOHyperparameters
 86    performance_metrics: Dict[str, float]
 87    optimization_history: List[Dict[str, Any]]
 88    controller_type: SMCType
 89    optimization_time: float
 90    validation_results: Dict[str, Any]
 91    improvement_ratio: float
 92    success: bool
 93
 94
 95class PSOHyperparameterOptimizer:
 96    """
 97    Advanced PSO hyperparameter optimizer for factory-generated controllers.
 98
 99    Optimizes PSO hyperparameters specifically for each controller type to maximize
100    convergence efficiency and solution quality in the factory integration context.
101    """
102
103    def __init__(self, config_path: str = "config.yaml"):
104        """Initialize PSO hyperparameter optimizer."""
105        self.config = load_config(config_path)
106        self.logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)
107
108        # Set reproducible seed
109        set_global_seed(42)
110
111        # Optimization parameters
112        self.optimization_trials = 20  # Number of trials per configuration
113        self.validation_trials = 5     # Number of validation trials
114        self.max_optimization_time = 600.0  # Maximum optimization time (seconds)
115
116        # Performance tracking
117        self.optimization_history = []
118        self.controller_performance_db = {}
119
120        # Initialize parameter search spaces
121        self.parameter_bounds = self._initialize_parameter_bounds()
122
123        # Controller-specific baseline parameters
124        self.baseline_parameters = self._initialize_baseline_parameters()
125
126    def _initialize_parameter_bounds(self) -> Dict[str, Tuple[float, float]]:
127        """Initialize search bounds for PSO hyperparameters."""
128        return {
129            'population_size': (8, 50),
130            'inertia_weight': (0.1, 0.9),
131            'cognitive_coefficient': (0.5, 3.0),
132            'social_coefficient': (0.5, 3.0),
133            'velocity_clamp_factor': (0.1, 1.0),
134            'convergence_threshold': (1e-8, 1e-3),
135            'max_iterations': (20, 200),
136            'inertia_decay_rate': (0.95, 0.999),
137            'diversity_threshold': (1e-5, 1e-2),
138            'restart_threshold': (5, 50)
139        }
140
141    def _initialize_baseline_parameters(self) -> Dict[SMCType, PSOHyperparameters]:
142        """Initialize baseline PSO parameters for each controller type."""
143        return {
144            SMCType.CLASSICAL: PSOHyperparameters(
145                population_size=20,
146                inertia_weight=0.729,
147                cognitive_coefficient=1.49445,
148                social_coefficient=1.49445,
149                max_iterations=50,
150                convergence_threshold=1e-5
151            ),
152            SMCType.ADAPTIVE: PSOHyperparameters(
153                population_size=25,
154                inertia_weight=0.6,
155                cognitive_coefficient=1.8,
156                social_coefficient=1.2,
157                max_iterations=60,
158                convergence_threshold=5e-6
159            ),
160            SMCType.SUPER_TWISTING: PSOHyperparameters(
161                population_size=18,
162                inertia_weight=0.8,
163                cognitive_coefficient=1.3,
164                social_coefficient=1.7,
165                max_iterations=45,
166                convergence_threshold=2e-5
167            ),
168            SMCType.HYBRID: PSOHyperparameters(
169                population_size=22,
170                inertia_weight=0.65,
171                cognitive_coefficient=1.6,
172                social_coefficient=1.4,
173                max_iterations=55,
174                convergence_threshold=8e-6
175            )
176        }
177
178    def optimize_hyperparameters(self,
179                                controller_type: SMCType,
180                                objective: OptimizationObjective = OptimizationObjective.MULTI_OBJECTIVE,
181                                max_time: float = 300.0) -> OptimizationResult:
182        """
183        Optimize PSO hyperparameters for specific controller type.
184
185        Args:
186            controller_type: Controller type to optimize for
187            objective: Optimization objective
188            max_time: Maximum optimization time in seconds
189
190        Returns:
191            OptimizationResult with optimized parameters and metrics
192        """
193        self.logger.info(f"Optimizing PSO hyperparameters for {controller_type.value}")
194        start_time = time.time()
195
196        # Get baseline parameters
197        baseline_params = self.baseline_parameters[controller_type]
198
199        # Create optimization objective function
200        objective_function = self._create_objective_function(controller_type, objective)
201
202        # Run hyperparameter optimization
203        try:
204            optimization_result = self._run_optimization(
205                objective_function, controller_type, max_time * 0.8
206            )
207
208            # Extract optimized parameters
209            optimized_params = self._parameters_from_vector(optimization_result.x)
210
211            # Validate optimized parameters
212            validation_results = self._validate_optimized_parameters(
213                controller_type, optimized_params, max_time * 0.2
214            )
215
216            # Calculate improvement ratio
217            improvement_ratio = self._calculate_improvement_ratio(
218                baseline_params, optimized_params, controller_type
219            )
220
221            optimization_time = time.time() - start_time
222
223            # Create result object
224            result = OptimizationResult(
225                optimized_parameters=optimized_params,
226                performance_metrics=validation_results['performance_metrics'],
227                optimization_history=self.optimization_history.copy(),
228                controller_type=controller_type,
229                optimization_time=optimization_time,
230                validation_results=validation_results,
231                improvement_ratio=improvement_ratio,
232                success=validation_results['validation_successful']
233            )
234
235            self.logger.info(
236                f"Hyperparameter optimization completed for {controller_type.value}: "
237                f"Improvement: {improvement_ratio:.2f}x, Time: {optimization_time:.1f}s"
238            )
239
240            return result
241
242        except Exception as e:
243            self.logger.error(f"Hyperparameter optimization failed for {controller_type.value}: {e}")
244            optimization_time = time.time() - start_time
245
246            return OptimizationResult(
247                optimized_parameters=baseline_params,
248                performance_metrics={},
249                optimization_history=[],
250                controller_type=controller_type,
251                optimization_time=optimization_time,
252                validation_results={'error': str(e)},
253                improvement_ratio=1.0,
254                success=False
255            )
256
257    def _create_objective_function(self,
258                                 controller_type: SMCType,
259                                 objective: OptimizationObjective) -> Callable:
260        """Create objective function for hyperparameter optimization."""
261
262        def objective_function(parameter_vector: np.ndarray) -> float:
263            """Objective function for PSO hyperparameter optimization."""
264            try:
265                # Convert parameter vector to PSO hyperparameters
266                params = self._parameters_from_vector(parameter_vector)
267
268                # Evaluate PSO performance with these parameters
269                performance = self._evaluate_pso_performance(controller_type, params)
270
271                # Calculate objective value based on optimization goal
272                if objective == OptimizationObjective.CONVERGENCE_SPEED:
273                    # Minimize convergence time
274                    objective_value = performance['convergence_time'] + performance['iterations'] * 0.1
275
276                elif objective == OptimizationObjective.SOLUTION_QUALITY:
277                    # Minimize final cost
278                    objective_value = performance['final_cost'] * 1000
279
280                elif objective == OptimizationObjective.ROBUSTNESS:
281                    # Minimize variance across multiple runs
282                    objective_value = performance['cost_variance'] * 1000 + performance['convergence_variance']
283
284                elif objective == OptimizationObjective.EFFICIENCY:
285                    # Balance quality and computational cost
286                    objective_value = (
287                        performance['final_cost'] * 500 +
288                        performance['convergence_time'] * 0.5 +
289                        performance['iterations'] * 0.1
290                    )
291
292                else:  # MULTI_OBJECTIVE
293                    # Weighted combination of multiple objectives
294                    objective_value = (
295                        0.4 * performance['final_cost'] * 1000 +
296                        0.3 * performance['convergence_time'] +
297                        0.2 * performance['iterations'] * 0.1 +
298                        0.1 * performance['cost_variance'] * 1000
299                    )
300
301                return float(objective_value)
302
303            except Exception as e:
304                self.logger.warning(f"Objective function evaluation failed: {e}")
305                return 1e6  # Large penalty for failed evaluations
306
307        return objective_function
308
309    def _parameters_from_vector(self, vector: np.ndarray) -> PSOHyperparameters:
310        """Convert optimization vector to PSO hyperparameters."""
311        bounds = self.parameter_bounds
312
313        # Ensure vector has correct length
314        expected_length = len(bounds)
315        if len(vector) != expected_length:
316            raise ValueError(f"Expected vector length {expected_length}, got {len(vector)}")
317
318        # Map vector values to parameter ranges
319        param_values = {}
320        for i, (param_name, (lower, upper)) in enumerate(bounds.items()):
321            # Clamp and scale vector value to parameter range
322            clamped_value = np.clip(vector[i], 0.0, 1.0)
323            scaled_value = lower + clamped_value * (upper - lower)
324
325            # Apply type conversion for integer parameters
326            if param_name in ['population_size', 'max_iterations', 'restart_threshold']:
327                scaled_value = int(round(scaled_value))
328
329            param_values[param_name] = scaled_value
330
331        # Create PSOHyperparameters object
332        return PSOHyperparameters(
333            population_size=param_values['population_size'],
334            inertia_weight=param_values['inertia_weight'],
335            cognitive_coefficient=param_values['cognitive_coefficient'],
336            social_coefficient=param_values['social_coefficient'],
337            velocity_clamp_factor=param_values['velocity_clamp_factor'],
338            convergence_threshold=param_values['convergence_threshold'],
339            max_iterations=param_values['max_iterations'],
340            inertia_decay_rate=param_values['inertia_decay_rate'],
341            diversity_threshold=param_values['diversity_threshold'],
342            restart_threshold=param_values['restart_threshold']
343        )
344
345    def _parameters_to_vector(self, params: PSOHyperparameters) -> np.ndarray:
346        """Convert PSO hyperparameters to optimization vector."""
347        bounds = self.parameter_bounds
348        vector = []
349
350        for param_name, (lower, upper) in bounds.items():
351            value = getattr(params, param_name)
352            # Normalize to [0, 1] range
353            normalized_value = (value - lower) / (upper - lower)
354            vector.append(np.clip(normalized_value, 0.0, 1.0))
355
356        return np.array(vector)
357
358    def _evaluate_pso_performance(self,
359                                controller_type: SMCType,
360                                params: PSOHyperparameters) -> Dict[str, float]:
361        """Evaluate PSO performance with given hyperparameters."""
362        # Create controller factory
363        def controller_factory(gains):
364            return create_smc_for_pso(
365                smc_type=controller_type,
366                gains=gains,
367                max_force=150.0
368            )
369
370        # Performance metrics across multiple trials
371        trial_results = []
372
373        # Run multiple trials for statistical reliability
374        num_trials = min(3, self.optimization_trials)
375
376        for trial in range(num_trials):
377            try:
378                # Create PSO tuner with specified hyperparameters
379                tuner = PSOTuner(
380                    controller_factory=controller_factory,
381                    config=self.config,
382                    seed=42 + trial
383                )
384
385                # Run PSO optimization
386                start_time = time.time()
387                result = tuner.optimise(
388                    n_particles_override=params.population_size,
389                    iters_override=min(params.max_iterations, 30),  # Limit for speed
390                    options_override={
391                        'w': params.inertia_weight,
392                        'c1': params.cognitive_coefficient,
393                        'c2': params.social_coefficient
394                    }
395                )
396                convergence_time = time.time() - start_time
397
398                # Extract performance metrics
399                final_cost = result['best_cost']
400                cost_history = result.get('history', {}).get('cost', [])
401                iterations = len(cost_history)
402
403                trial_results.append({
404                    'final_cost': final_cost,
405                    'convergence_time': convergence_time,
406                    'iterations': iterations,
407                    'cost_history': cost_history
408                })
409
410            except Exception as e:
411                self.logger.debug(f"PSO trial failed: {e}")
412                # Add penalty result
413                trial_results.append({
414                    'final_cost': 1000.0,
415                    'convergence_time': 60.0,
416                    'iterations': params.max_iterations,
417                    'cost_history': []
418                })
419
420        # Calculate aggregate performance metrics
421        if trial_results:
422            final_costs = [r['final_cost'] for r in trial_results]
423            convergence_times = [r['convergence_time'] for r in trial_results]
424            iterations_list = [r['iterations'] for r in trial_results]
425
426            performance = {
427                'final_cost': np.mean(final_costs),
428                'cost_variance': np.var(final_costs),
429                'convergence_time': np.mean(convergence_times),
430                'convergence_variance': np.var(convergence_times),
431                'iterations': np.mean(iterations_list),
432                'success_rate': sum(1 for cost in final_costs if cost < 100) / len(final_costs)
433            }
434        else:
435            # No successful trials
436            performance = {
437                'final_cost': 1000.0,
438                'cost_variance': 0.0,
439                'convergence_time': 60.0,
440                'convergence_variance': 0.0,
441                'iterations': params.max_iterations,
442                'success_rate': 0.0
443            }
444
445        return performance
446
447    def _run_optimization(self,
448                        objective_function: Callable,
449                        controller_type: SMCType,
450                        max_time: float) -> Any:
451        """Run hyperparameter optimization using differential evolution."""
452        # Get baseline parameters as starting point
453        baseline_params = self.baseline_parameters[controller_type]
454        initial_guess = self._parameters_to_vector(baseline_params)
455
456        # Define bounds for optimization (normalized to [0, 1])
457        bounds = [(0.0, 1.0) for _ in range(len(self.parameter_bounds))]
458
459        try:
460            # Use differential evolution for global optimization
461            result = differential_evolution(
462                objective_function,
463                bounds,
464                seed=42,
465                maxiter=15,  # Limit iterations for time constraints
466                popsize=8,   # Small population for efficiency
467                atol=1e-3,
468                tol=1e-3,
469                workers=1,   # Single worker to avoid conflicts
470                updating='immediate'
471            )
472
473            self.logger.info(f"Optimization completed: {result.message}")
474            return result
475
476        except Exception as e:
477            self.logger.warning(f"Differential evolution failed: {e}, using local optimization")
478
479            # Fallback to local optimization
480            try:
481                result = minimize(
482                    objective_function,
483                    initial_guess,
484                    bounds=bounds,
485                    method='L-BFGS-B',
486                    options={'maxiter': 10}
487                )
488                return result
489
490            except Exception as e2:
491                self.logger.error(f"Local optimization also failed: {e2}")
492                # Return baseline parameters
493                class FallbackResult:
494                    def __init__(self, x):
495                        self.x = x
496                        self.success = False
497
498                return FallbackResult(initial_guess)
499
500    def _validate_optimized_parameters(self,
501                                     controller_type: SMCType,
502                                     optimized_params: PSOHyperparameters,
503                                     max_time: float) -> Dict[str, Any]:
504        """Validate optimized parameters through comprehensive testing."""
505        validation_results = {
506            'validation_successful': False,
507            'performance_metrics': {},
508            'parameter_stability': False,
509            'convergence_reliability': False
510        }
511
512        try:
513            # Test 1: Parameter reasonableness
514            param_bounds = self.parameter_bounds
515            reasonable_params = True
516
517            for param_name, (lower, upper) in param_bounds.items():
518                value = getattr(optimized_params, param_name)
519                if not (lower <= value <= upper):
520                    reasonable_params = False
521                    break
522
523            # Test 2: Convergence reliability
524            performance_results = []
525            for trial in range(self.validation_trials):
526                try:
527                    performance = self._evaluate_pso_performance(
528                        controller_type, optimized_params
529                    )
530                    performance_results.append(performance)
531                except Exception as e:
532                    self.logger.debug(f"Validation trial {trial} failed: {e}")
533
534            if performance_results:
535                # Calculate reliability metrics
536                final_costs = [r['final_cost'] for r in performance_results]
537                convergence_times = [r['convergence_time'] for r in performance_results]
538                success_rates = [r['success_rate'] for r in performance_results]
539
540                avg_final_cost = np.mean(final_costs)
541                cost_consistency = 1.0 - (np.std(final_costs) / max(avg_final_cost, 1e-6))
542                avg_success_rate = np.mean(success_rates)
543
544                validation_results['performance_metrics'] = {
545                    'average_final_cost': avg_final_cost,
546                    'cost_consistency': cost_consistency,
547                    'average_convergence_time': np.mean(convergence_times),
548                    'average_success_rate': avg_success_rate
549                }
550
551                # Success criteria
552                convergence_reliable = (
553                    avg_final_cost < 50.0 and
554                    avg_success_rate > 0.6 and
555                    cost_consistency > 0.7
556                )
557
558                validation_results['convergence_reliability'] = convergence_reliable
559                validation_results['parameter_stability'] = reasonable_params
560
561                validation_results['validation_successful'] = (
562                    reasonable_params and convergence_reliable
563                )
564
565        except Exception as e:
566            validation_results['error'] = str(e)
567            self.logger.error(f"Parameter validation failed: {e}")
568
569        return validation_results
570
571    def _calculate_improvement_ratio(self,
572                                   baseline_params: PSOHyperparameters,
573                                   optimized_params: PSOHyperparameters,
574                                   controller_type: SMCType) -> float:
575        """Calculate improvement ratio from parameter optimization."""
576        try:
577            # Evaluate baseline performance
578            baseline_performance = self._evaluate_pso_performance(controller_type, baseline_params)
579
580            # Evaluate optimized performance
581            optimized_performance = self._evaluate_pso_performance(controller_type, optimized_params)
582
583            # Calculate improvement metrics
584            cost_improvement = (
585                baseline_performance['final_cost'] /
586                max(optimized_performance['final_cost'], 1e-6)
587            )
588
589            time_improvement = (
590                baseline_performance['convergence_time'] /
591                max(optimized_performance['convergence_time'], 1e-6)
592            )
593
594            success_improvement = (
595                optimized_performance['success_rate'] /
596                max(baseline_performance['success_rate'], 1e-6)
597            )
598
599            # Geometric mean of improvements
600            improvement_ratio = (cost_improvement * time_improvement * success_improvement) ** (1/3)
601
602            return min(5.0, improvement_ratio)  # Cap at 5x improvement
603
604        except Exception as e:
605            self.logger.warning(f"Improvement calculation failed: {e}")
606            return 1.0
607
608    def optimize_all_controllers(self,
609                               objective: OptimizationObjective = OptimizationObjective.MULTI_OBJECTIVE
610                               ) -> Dict[SMCType, OptimizationResult]:
611        """Optimize hyperparameters for all controller types."""
612        self.logger.info("Optimizing PSO hyperparameters for all controllers")
613
614        results = {}
615        optimization_time_per_controller = self.max_optimization_time / 4
616
617        for controller_type in [SMCType.CLASSICAL, SMCType.ADAPTIVE, SMCType.SUPER_TWISTING, SMCType.HYBRID]:
618            try:
619                result = self.optimize_hyperparameters(
620                    controller_type, objective, optimization_time_per_controller
621                )
622                results[controller_type] = result
623
624                status = "✓ SUCCESS" if result.success else "✗ FAILED"
625                self.logger.info(
626                    f"{status} {controller_type.value}: "
627                    f"Improvement: {result.improvement_ratio:.2f}x"
628                )
629
630            except Exception as e:
631                self.logger.error(f"Optimization failed for {controller_type.value}: {e}")
632                results[controller_type] = OptimizationResult(
633                    optimized_parameters=self.baseline_parameters[controller_type],
634                    performance_metrics={},
635                    optimization_history=[],
636                    controller_type=controller_type,
637                    optimization_time=0.0,
638                    validation_results={'error': str(e)},
639                    improvement_ratio=1.0,
640                    success=False
641                )
642
643        return results
644
645    def export_optimized_configuration(self,
646                                     optimization_results: Dict[SMCType, OptimizationResult],
647                                     output_path: str = "optimized_pso_hyperparameters.json"
648                                     ) -> Dict[str, Any]:
649        """Export optimized hyperparameters as configuration file."""
650        export_config = {
651            'metadata': {
652                'optimization_timestamp': time.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S'),
653                'optimization_objective': 'multi_objective',
654                'total_optimization_time': sum(r.optimization_time for r in optimization_results.values()),
655                'overall_success_rate': sum(1 for r in optimization_results.values() if r.success) / len(optimization_results)
656            },
657            'optimized_hyperparameters': {},
658            'performance_summary': {}
659        }
660
661        for controller_type, result in optimization_results.items():
662            controller_key = controller_type.value
663            params = result.optimized_parameters
664
665            export_config['optimized_hyperparameters'][controller_key] = {
666                'population_size': params.population_size,
667                'inertia_weight': params.inertia_weight,
668                'cognitive_coefficient': params.cognitive_coefficient,
669                'social_coefficient': params.social_coefficient,
670                'velocity_clamp_factor': params.velocity_clamp_factor,
671                'convergence_threshold': params.convergence_threshold,
672                'max_iterations': params.max_iterations,
673                'adaptive_inertia': params.adaptive_inertia,
674                'inertia_decay_rate': params.inertia_decay_rate,
675                'diversity_threshold': params.diversity_threshold,
676                'restart_threshold': params.restart_threshold
677            }
678
679            export_config['performance_summary'][controller_key] = {
680                'improvement_ratio': result.improvement_ratio,
681                'optimization_successful': result.success,
682                'optimization_time_seconds': result.optimization_time,
683                'performance_metrics': result.performance_metrics
684            }
685
686        # Save to file
687        with open(output_path, 'w') as f:
688            json.dump(export_config, f, indent=2)
689
690        self.logger.info(f"Optimized hyperparameters exported to {output_path}")
691        return export_config
692
693
694def run_pso_hyperparameter_optimization() -> Dict[str, Any]:
695    """Run complete PSO hyperparameter optimization workflow."""
696    print("=" * 80)
697    print("PSO HYPERPARAMETER OPTIMIZATION - GitHub Issue #6")
698    print("Advanced PSO Parameter Tuning for Factory Controllers")
699    print("=" * 80)
700
701    # Initialize optimizer
702    optimizer = PSOHyperparameterOptimizer()
703
704    # Run optimization for all controllers
705    print("\n🔍 Optimizing PSO hyperparameters for all controller types...")
706    optimization_results = optimizer.optimize_all_controllers(
707        objective=OptimizationObjective.MULTI_OBJECTIVE
708    )
709
710    # Export optimized configuration
711    print("\n📤 Exporting optimized hyperparameter configuration...")
712    config_export = optimizer.export_optimized_configuration(optimization_results)
713
714    # Print summary
715    print("\n" + "=" * 60)
716    print("PSO HYPERPARAMETER OPTIMIZATION SUMMARY")
717    print("=" * 60)
718
719    successful_optimizations = 0
720    total_improvement = 0.0
721
722    for controller_type, result in optimization_results.items():
723        status = "✅ SUCCESS" if result.success else "❌ FAILED"
724        improvement = result.improvement_ratio
725
726        print(f"{controller_type.value:25} | {status} | Improvement: {improvement:.2f}x")
727
728        if result.success:
729            successful_optimizations += 1
730            total_improvement += improvement
731
732    success_rate = (successful_optimizations / len(optimization_results)) * 100
733    avg_improvement = total_improvement / max(successful_optimizations, 1)
734
735    print("\n" + "-" * 60)
736    print(f"Overall Success Rate: {success_rate:.1f}%")
737    print(f"Average Improvement: {avg_improvement:.2f}x")
738    print(f"Total Optimization Time: {sum(r.optimization_time for r in optimization_results.values()):.1f}s")
739
740    if success_rate >= 75:
741        print("\n🎉 PSO HYPERPARAMETER OPTIMIZATION: SUCCESSFUL")
742        print("✅ Enhanced PSO parameters for improved convergence")
743        print("✅ Controller-specific hyperparameter tuning completed")
744        print("✅ Multi-objective optimization objectives achieved")
745        print("✅ Configuration exported for production use")
746    else:
747        print("\n⚠️  PSO HYPERPARAMETER OPTIMIZATION: PARTIAL SUCCESS")
748        print(f"✅ {successful_optimizations}/{len(optimization_results)} controllers optimized")
749        print("⚠️  Some controllers may benefit from manual parameter tuning")
750
751    return {
752        'optimization_results': optimization_results,
753        'config_export': config_export,
754        'summary': {
755            'success_rate': success_rate,
756            'average_improvement': avg_improvement,
757            'successful_optimizations': successful_optimizations,
758            'total_controllers': len(optimization_results)
759        }
760    }
761
762
763if __name__ == "__main__":
764    results = run_pso_hyperparameter_optimization()

PSOHyperparameterOptimizer¶

Advanced PSO hyperparameter optimizer for factory-generated controllers.

Optimizes PSO hyperparameters specifically for each controller type to maximize convergence efficiency and solution quality in the factory integration context.

Source Code¶

  1class PSOHyperparameterOptimizer:
  2    """
  3    Advanced PSO hyperparameter optimizer for factory-generated controllers.
  4
  5    Optimizes PSO hyperparameters specifically for each controller type to maximize
  6    convergence efficiency and solution quality in the factory integration context.
  7    """
  8
  9    def __init__(self, config_path: str = "config.yaml"):
 10        """Initialize PSO hyperparameter optimizer."""
 11        self.config = load_config(config_path)
 12        self.logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)
 13
 14        # Set reproducible seed
 15        set_global_seed(42)
 16
 17        # Optimization parameters
 18        self.optimization_trials = 20  # Number of trials per configuration
 19        self.validation_trials = 5     # Number of validation trials
 20        self.max_optimization_time = 600.0  # Maximum optimization time (seconds)
 21
 22        # Performance tracking
 23        self.optimization_history = []
 24        self.controller_performance_db = {}
 25
 26        # Initialize parameter search spaces
 27        self.parameter_bounds = self._initialize_parameter_bounds()
 28
 29        # Controller-specific baseline parameters
 30        self.baseline_parameters = self._initialize_baseline_parameters()
 31
 32    def _initialize_parameter_bounds(self) -> Dict[str, Tuple[float, float]]:
 33        """Initialize search bounds for PSO hyperparameters."""
 34        return {
 35            'population_size': (8, 50),
 36            'inertia_weight': (0.1, 0.9),
 37            'cognitive_coefficient': (0.5, 3.0),
 38            'social_coefficient': (0.5, 3.0),
 39            'velocity_clamp_factor': (0.1, 1.0),
 40            'convergence_threshold': (1e-8, 1e-3),
 41            'max_iterations': (20, 200),
 42            'inertia_decay_rate': (0.95, 0.999),
 43            'diversity_threshold': (1e-5, 1e-2),
 44            'restart_threshold': (5, 50)
 45        }
 46
 47    def _initialize_baseline_parameters(self) -> Dict[SMCType, PSOHyperparameters]:
 48        """Initialize baseline PSO parameters for each controller type."""
 49        return {
 50            SMCType.CLASSICAL: PSOHyperparameters(
 51                population_size=20,
 52                inertia_weight=0.729,
 53                cognitive_coefficient=1.49445,
 54                social_coefficient=1.49445,
 55                max_iterations=50,
 56                convergence_threshold=1e-5
 57            ),
 58            SMCType.ADAPTIVE: PSOHyperparameters(
 59                population_size=25,
 60                inertia_weight=0.6,
 61                cognitive_coefficient=1.8,
 62                social_coefficient=1.2,
 63                max_iterations=60,
 64                convergence_threshold=5e-6
 65            ),
 66            SMCType.SUPER_TWISTING: PSOHyperparameters(
 67                population_size=18,
 68                inertia_weight=0.8,
 69                cognitive_coefficient=1.3,
 70                social_coefficient=1.7,
 71                max_iterations=45,
 72                convergence_threshold=2e-5
 73            ),
 74            SMCType.HYBRID: PSOHyperparameters(
 75                population_size=22,
 76                inertia_weight=0.65,
 77                cognitive_coefficient=1.6,
 78                social_coefficient=1.4,
 79                max_iterations=55,
 80                convergence_threshold=8e-6
 81            )
 82        }
 83
 84    def optimize_hyperparameters(self,
 85                                controller_type: SMCType,
 86                                objective: OptimizationObjective = OptimizationObjective.MULTI_OBJECTIVE,
 87                                max_time: float = 300.0) -> OptimizationResult:
 88        """
 89        Optimize PSO hyperparameters for specific controller type.
 90
 91        Args:
 92            controller_type: Controller type to optimize for
 93            objective: Optimization objective
 94            max_time: Maximum optimization time in seconds
 95
 96        Returns:
 97            OptimizationResult with optimized parameters and metrics
 98        """
 99        self.logger.info(f"Optimizing PSO hyperparameters for {controller_type.value}")
100        start_time = time.time()
101
102        # Get baseline parameters
103        baseline_params = self.baseline_parameters[controller_type]
104
105        # Create optimization objective function
106        objective_function = self._create_objective_function(controller_type, objective)
107
108        # Run hyperparameter optimization
109        try:
110            optimization_result = self._run_optimization(
111                objective_function, controller_type, max_time * 0.8
112            )
113
114            # Extract optimized parameters
115            optimized_params = self._parameters_from_vector(optimization_result.x)
116
117            # Validate optimized parameters
118            validation_results = self._validate_optimized_parameters(
119                controller_type, optimized_params, max_time * 0.2
120            )
121
122            # Calculate improvement ratio
123            improvement_ratio = self._calculate_improvement_ratio(
124                baseline_params, optimized_params, controller_type
125            )
126
127            optimization_time = time.time() - start_time
128
129            # Create result object
130            result = OptimizationResult(
131                optimized_parameters=optimized_params,
132                performance_metrics=validation_results['performance_metrics'],
133                optimization_history=self.optimization_history.copy(),
134                controller_type=controller_type,
135                optimization_time=optimization_time,
136                validation_results=validation_results,
137                improvement_ratio=improvement_ratio,
138                success=validation_results['validation_successful']
139            )
140
141            self.logger.info(
142                f"Hyperparameter optimization completed for {controller_type.value}: "
143                f"Improvement: {improvement_ratio:.2f}x, Time: {optimization_time:.1f}s"
144            )
145
146            return result
147
148        except Exception as e:
149            self.logger.error(f"Hyperparameter optimization failed for {controller_type.value}: {e}")
150            optimization_time = time.time() - start_time
151
152            return OptimizationResult(
153                optimized_parameters=baseline_params,
154                performance_metrics={},
155                optimization_history=[],
156                controller_type=controller_type,
157                optimization_time=optimization_time,
158                validation_results={'error': str(e)},
159                improvement_ratio=1.0,
160                success=False
161            )
162
163    def _create_objective_function(self,
164                                 controller_type: SMCType,
165                                 objective: OptimizationObjective) -> Callable:
166        """Create objective function for hyperparameter optimization."""
167
168        def objective_function(parameter_vector: np.ndarray) -> float:
169            """Objective function for PSO hyperparameter optimization."""
170            try:
171                # Convert parameter vector to PSO hyperparameters
172                params = self._parameters_from_vector(parameter_vector)
173
174                # Evaluate PSO performance with these parameters
175                performance = self._evaluate_pso_performance(controller_type, params)
176
177                # Calculate objective value based on optimization goal
178                if objective == OptimizationObjective.CONVERGENCE_SPEED:
179                    # Minimize convergence time
180                    objective_value = performance['convergence_time'] + performance['iterations'] * 0.1
181
182                elif objective == OptimizationObjective.SOLUTION_QUALITY:
183                    # Minimize final cost
184                    objective_value = performance['final_cost'] * 1000
185
186                elif objective == OptimizationObjective.ROBUSTNESS:
187                    # Minimize variance across multiple runs
188                    objective_value = performance['cost_variance'] * 1000 + performance['convergence_variance']
189
190                elif objective == OptimizationObjective.EFFICIENCY:
191                    # Balance quality and computational cost
192                    objective_value = (
193                        performance['final_cost'] * 500 +
194                        performance['convergence_time'] * 0.5 +
195                        performance['iterations'] * 0.1
196                    )
197
198                else:  # MULTI_OBJECTIVE
199                    # Weighted combination of multiple objectives
200                    objective_value = (
201                        0.4 * performance['final_cost'] * 1000 +
202                        0.3 * performance['convergence_time'] +
203                        0.2 * performance['iterations'] * 0.1 +
204                        0.1 * performance['cost_variance'] * 1000
205                    )
206
207                return float(objective_value)
208
209            except Exception as e:
210                self.logger.warning(f"Objective function evaluation failed: {e}")
211                return 1e6  # Large penalty for failed evaluations
212
213        return objective_function
214
215    def _parameters_from_vector(self, vector: np.ndarray) -> PSOHyperparameters:
216        """Convert optimization vector to PSO hyperparameters."""
217        bounds = self.parameter_bounds
218
219        # Ensure vector has correct length
220        expected_length = len(bounds)
221        if len(vector) != expected_length:
222            raise ValueError(f"Expected vector length {expected_length}, got {len(vector)}")
223
224        # Map vector values to parameter ranges
225        param_values = {}
226        for i, (param_name, (lower, upper)) in enumerate(bounds.items()):
227            # Clamp and scale vector value to parameter range
228            clamped_value = np.clip(vector[i], 0.0, 1.0)
229            scaled_value = lower + clamped_value * (upper - lower)
230
231            # Apply type conversion for integer parameters
232            if param_name in ['population_size', 'max_iterations', 'restart_threshold']:
233                scaled_value = int(round(scaled_value))
234
235            param_values[param_name] = scaled_value
236
237        # Create PSOHyperparameters object
238        return PSOHyperparameters(
239            population_size=param_values['population_size'],
240            inertia_weight=param_values['inertia_weight'],
241            cognitive_coefficient=param_values['cognitive_coefficient'],
242            social_coefficient=param_values['social_coefficient'],
243            velocity_clamp_factor=param_values['velocity_clamp_factor'],
244            convergence_threshold=param_values['convergence_threshold'],
245            max_iterations=param_values['max_iterations'],
246            inertia_decay_rate=param_values['inertia_decay_rate'],
247            diversity_threshold=param_values['diversity_threshold'],
248            restart_threshold=param_values['restart_threshold']
249        )
250
251    def _parameters_to_vector(self, params: PSOHyperparameters) -> np.ndarray:
252        """Convert PSO hyperparameters to optimization vector."""
253        bounds = self.parameter_bounds
254        vector = []
255
256        for param_name, (lower, upper) in bounds.items():
257            value = getattr(params, param_name)
258            # Normalize to [0, 1] range
259            normalized_value = (value - lower) / (upper - lower)
260            vector.append(np.clip(normalized_value, 0.0, 1.0))
261
262        return np.array(vector)
263
264    def _evaluate_pso_performance(self,
265                                controller_type: SMCType,
266                                params: PSOHyperparameters) -> Dict[str, float]:
267        """Evaluate PSO performance with given hyperparameters."""
268        # Create controller factory
269        def controller_factory(gains):
270            return create_smc_for_pso(
271                smc_type=controller_type,
272                gains=gains,
273                max_force=150.0
274            )
275
276        # Performance metrics across multiple trials
277        trial_results = []
278
279        # Run multiple trials for statistical reliability
280        num_trials = min(3, self.optimization_trials)
281
282        for trial in range(num_trials):
283            try:
284                # Create PSO tuner with specified hyperparameters
285                tuner = PSOTuner(
286                    controller_factory=controller_factory,
287                    config=self.config,
288                    seed=42 + trial
289                )
290
291                # Run PSO optimization
292                start_time = time.time()
293                result = tuner.optimise(
294                    n_particles_override=params.population_size,
295                    iters_override=min(params.max_iterations, 30),  # Limit for speed
296                    options_override={
297                        'w': params.inertia_weight,
298                        'c1': params.cognitive_coefficient,
299                        'c2': params.social_coefficient
300                    }
301                )
302                convergence_time = time.time() - start_time
303
304                # Extract performance metrics
305                final_cost = result['best_cost']
306                cost_history = result.get('history', {}).get('cost', [])
307                iterations = len(cost_history)
308
309                trial_results.append({
310                    'final_cost': final_cost,
311                    'convergence_time': convergence_time,
312                    'iterations': iterations,
313                    'cost_history': cost_history
314                })
315
316            except Exception as e:
317                self.logger.debug(f"PSO trial failed: {e}")
318                # Add penalty result
319                trial_results.append({
320                    'final_cost': 1000.0,
321                    'convergence_time': 60.0,
322                    'iterations': params.max_iterations,
323                    'cost_history': []
324                })
325
326        # Calculate aggregate performance metrics
327        if trial_results:
328            final_costs = [r['final_cost'] for r in trial_results]
329            convergence_times = [r['convergence_time'] for r in trial_results]
330            iterations_list = [r['iterations'] for r in trial_results]
331
332            performance = {
333                'final_cost': np.mean(final_costs),
334                'cost_variance': np.var(final_costs),
335                'convergence_time': np.mean(convergence_times),
336                'convergence_variance': np.var(convergence_times),
337                'iterations': np.mean(iterations_list),
338                'success_rate': sum(1 for cost in final_costs if cost < 100) / len(final_costs)
339            }
340        else:
341            # No successful trials
342            performance = {
343                'final_cost': 1000.0,
344                'cost_variance': 0.0,
345                'convergence_time': 60.0,
346                'convergence_variance': 0.0,
347                'iterations': params.max_iterations,
348                'success_rate': 0.0
349            }
350
351        return performance
352
353    def _run_optimization(self,
354                        objective_function: Callable,
355                        controller_type: SMCType,
356                        max_time: float) -> Any:
357        """Run hyperparameter optimization using differential evolution."""
358        # Get baseline parameters as starting point
359        baseline_params = self.baseline_parameters[controller_type]
360        initial_guess = self._parameters_to_vector(baseline_params)
361
362        # Define bounds for optimization (normalized to [0, 1])
363        bounds = [(0.0, 1.0) for _ in range(len(self.parameter_bounds))]
364
365        try:
366            # Use differential evolution for global optimization
367            result = differential_evolution(
368                objective_function,
369                bounds,
370                seed=42,
371                maxiter=15,  # Limit iterations for time constraints
372                popsize=8,   # Small population for efficiency
373                atol=1e-3,
374                tol=1e-3,
375                workers=1,   # Single worker to avoid conflicts
376                updating='immediate'
377            )
378
379            self.logger.info(f"Optimization completed: {result.message}")
380            return result
381
382        except Exception as e:
383            self.logger.warning(f"Differential evolution failed: {e}, using local optimization")
384
385            # Fallback to local optimization
386            try:
387                result = minimize(
388                    objective_function,
389                    initial_guess,
390                    bounds=bounds,
391                    method='L-BFGS-B',
392                    options={'maxiter': 10}
393                )
394                return result
395
396            except Exception as e2:
397                self.logger.error(f"Local optimization also failed: {e2}")
398                # Return baseline parameters
399                class FallbackResult:
400                    def __init__(self, x):
401                        self.x = x
402                        self.success = False
403
404                return FallbackResult(initial_guess)
405
406    def _validate_optimized_parameters(self,
407                                     controller_type: SMCType,
408                                     optimized_params: PSOHyperparameters,
409                                     max_time: float) -> Dict[str, Any]:
410        """Validate optimized parameters through comprehensive testing."""
411        validation_results = {
412            'validation_successful': False,
413            'performance_metrics': {},
414            'parameter_stability': False,
415            'convergence_reliability': False
416        }
417
418        try:
419            # Test 1: Parameter reasonableness
420            param_bounds = self.parameter_bounds
421            reasonable_params = True
422
423            for param_name, (lower, upper) in param_bounds.items():
424                value = getattr(optimized_params, param_name)
425                if not (lower <= value <= upper):
426                    reasonable_params = False
427                    break
428
429            # Test 2: Convergence reliability
430            performance_results = []
431            for trial in range(self.validation_trials):
432                try:
433                    performance = self._evaluate_pso_performance(
434                        controller_type, optimized_params
435                    )
436                    performance_results.append(performance)
437                except Exception as e:
438                    self.logger.debug(f"Validation trial {trial} failed: {e}")
439
440            if performance_results:
441                # Calculate reliability metrics
442                final_costs = [r['final_cost'] for r in performance_results]
443                convergence_times = [r['convergence_time'] for r in performance_results]
444                success_rates = [r['success_rate'] for r in performance_results]
445
446                avg_final_cost = np.mean(final_costs)
447                cost_consistency = 1.0 - (np.std(final_costs) / max(avg_final_cost, 1e-6))
448                avg_success_rate = np.mean(success_rates)
449
450                validation_results['performance_metrics'] = {
451                    'average_final_cost': avg_final_cost,
452                    'cost_consistency': cost_consistency,
453                    'average_convergence_time': np.mean(convergence_times),
454                    'average_success_rate': avg_success_rate
455                }
456
457                # Success criteria
458                convergence_reliable = (
459                    avg_final_cost < 50.0 and
460                    avg_success_rate > 0.6 and
461                    cost_consistency > 0.7
462                )
463
464                validation_results['convergence_reliability'] = convergence_reliable
465                validation_results['parameter_stability'] = reasonable_params
466
467                validation_results['validation_successful'] = (
468                    reasonable_params and convergence_reliable
469                )
470
471        except Exception as e:
472            validation_results['error'] = str(e)
473            self.logger.error(f"Parameter validation failed: {e}")
474
475        return validation_results
476
477    def _calculate_improvement_ratio(self,
478                                   baseline_params: PSOHyperparameters,
479                                   optimized_params: PSOHyperparameters,
480                                   controller_type: SMCType) -> float:
481        """Calculate improvement ratio from parameter optimization."""
482        try:
483            # Evaluate baseline performance
484            baseline_performance = self._evaluate_pso_performance(controller_type, baseline_params)
485
486            # Evaluate optimized performance
487            optimized_performance = self._evaluate_pso_performance(controller_type, optimized_params)
488
489            # Calculate improvement metrics
490            cost_improvement = (
491                baseline_performance['final_cost'] /
492                max(optimized_performance['final_cost'], 1e-6)
493            )
494
495            time_improvement = (
496                baseline_performance['convergence_time'] /
497                max(optimized_performance['convergence_time'], 1e-6)
498            )
499
500            success_improvement = (
501                optimized_performance['success_rate'] /
502                max(baseline_performance['success_rate'], 1e-6)
503            )
504
505            # Geometric mean of improvements
506            improvement_ratio = (cost_improvement * time_improvement * success_improvement) ** (1/3)
507
508            return min(5.0, improvement_ratio)  # Cap at 5x improvement
509
510        except Exception as e:
511            self.logger.warning(f"Improvement calculation failed: {e}")
512            return 1.0
513
514    def optimize_all_controllers(self,
515                               objective: OptimizationObjective = OptimizationObjective.MULTI_OBJECTIVE
516                               ) -> Dict[SMCType, OptimizationResult]:
517        """Optimize hyperparameters for all controller types."""
518        self.logger.info("Optimizing PSO hyperparameters for all controllers")
519
520        results = {}
521        optimization_time_per_controller = self.max_optimization_time / 4
522
523        for controller_type in [SMCType.CLASSICAL, SMCType.ADAPTIVE, SMCType.SUPER_TWISTING, SMCType.HYBRID]:
524            try:
525                result = self.optimize_hyperparameters(
526                    controller_type, objective, optimization_time_per_controller
527                )
528                results[controller_type] = result
529
530                status = "✓ SUCCESS" if result.success else "✗ FAILED"
531                self.logger.info(
532                    f"{status} {controller_type.value}: "
533                    f"Improvement: {result.improvement_ratio:.2f}x"
534                )
535
536            except Exception as e:
537                self.logger.error(f"Optimization failed for {controller_type.value}: {e}")
538                results[controller_type] = OptimizationResult(
539                    optimized_parameters=self.baseline_parameters[controller_type],
540                    performance_metrics={},
541                    optimization_history=[],
542                    controller_type=controller_type,
543                    optimization_time=0.0,
544                    validation_results={'error': str(e)},
545                    improvement_ratio=1.0,
546                    success=False
547                )
548
549        return results
550
551    def export_optimized_configuration(self,
552                                     optimization_results: Dict[SMCType, OptimizationResult],
553                                     output_path: str = "optimized_pso_hyperparameters.json"
554                                     ) -> Dict[str, Any]:
555        """Export optimized hyperparameters as configuration file."""
556        export_config = {
557            'metadata': {
558                'optimization_timestamp': time.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S'),
559                'optimization_objective': 'multi_objective',
560                'total_optimization_time': sum(r.optimization_time for r in optimization_results.values()),
561                'overall_success_rate': sum(1 for r in optimization_results.values() if r.success) / len(optimization_results)
562            },
563            'optimized_hyperparameters': {},
564            'performance_summary': {}
565        }
566
567        for controller_type, result in optimization_results.items():
568            controller_key = controller_type.value
569            params = result.optimized_parameters
570
571            export_config['optimized_hyperparameters'][controller_key] = {
572                'population_size': params.population_size,
573                'inertia_weight': params.inertia_weight,
574                'cognitive_coefficient': params.cognitive_coefficient,
575                'social_coefficient': params.social_coefficient,
576                'velocity_clamp_factor': params.velocity_clamp_factor,
577                'convergence_threshold': params.convergence_threshold,
578                'max_iterations': params.max_iterations,
579                'adaptive_inertia': params.adaptive_inertia,
580                'inertia_decay_rate': params.inertia_decay_rate,
581                'diversity_threshold': params.diversity_threshold,
582                'restart_threshold': params.restart_threshold
583            }
584
585            export_config['performance_summary'][controller_key] = {
586                'improvement_ratio': result.improvement_ratio,
587                'optimization_successful': result.success,
588                'optimization_time_seconds': result.optimization_time,
589                'performance_metrics': result.performance_metrics
590            }
591
592        # Save to file
593        with open(output_path, 'w') as f:
594            json.dump(export_config, f, indent=2)
595
596        self.logger.info(f"Optimized hyperparameters exported to {output_path}")
597        return export_config

Source Code¶

 1def run_pso_hyperparameter_optimization() -> Dict[str, Any]:
 2    """Run complete PSO hyperparameter optimization workflow."""
 3    print("=" * 80)
 4    print("PSO HYPERPARAMETER OPTIMIZATION - GitHub Issue #6")
 5    print("Advanced PSO Parameter Tuning for Factory Controllers")
 6    print("=" * 80)
 7
 8    # Initialize optimizer
 9    optimizer = PSOHyperparameterOptimizer()
10
11    # Run optimization for all controllers
12    print("\n🔍 Optimizing PSO hyperparameters for all controller types...")
13    optimization_results = optimizer.optimize_all_controllers(
14        objective=OptimizationObjective.MULTI_OBJECTIVE
15    )
16
17    # Export optimized configuration
18    print("\n📤 Exporting optimized hyperparameter configuration...")
19    config_export = optimizer.export_optimized_configuration(optimization_results)
20
21    # Print summary
22    print("\n" + "=" * 60)
23    print("PSO HYPERPARAMETER OPTIMIZATION SUMMARY")
24    print("=" * 60)
25
26    successful_optimizations = 0
27    total_improvement = 0.0
28
29    for controller_type, result in optimization_results.items():
30        status = "✅ SUCCESS" if result.success else "❌ FAILED"
31        improvement = result.improvement_ratio
32
33        print(f"{controller_type.value:25} | {status} | Improvement: {improvement:.2f}x")
34
35        if result.success:
36            successful_optimizations += 1
37            total_improvement += improvement
38
39    success_rate = (successful_optimizations / len(optimization_results)) * 100
40    avg_improvement = total_improvement / max(successful_optimizations, 1)
41
42    print("\n" + "-" * 60)
43    print(f"Overall Success Rate: {success_rate:.1f}%")
44    print(f"Average Improvement: {avg_improvement:.2f}x")
45    print(f"Total Optimization Time: {sum(r.optimization_time for r in optimization_results.values()):.1f}s")
46
47    if success_rate >= 75:
48        print("\n🎉 PSO HYPERPARAMETER OPTIMIZATION: SUCCESSFUL")
49        print("✅ Enhanced PSO parameters for improved convergence")
50        print("✅ Controller-specific hyperparameter tuning completed")
51        print("✅ Multi-objective optimization objectives achieved")
52        print("✅ Configuration exported for production use")
53    else:
54        print("\n⚠️  PSO HYPERPARAMETER OPTIMIZATION: PARTIAL SUCCESS")
55        print(f"✅ {successful_optimizations}/{len(optimization_results)} controllers optimized")
56        print("⚠️  Some controllers may benefit from manual parameter tuning")
57
58    return {
59        'optimization_results': optimization_results,
60        'config_export': config_export,
61        'summary': {
62            'success_rate': success_rate,
63            'average_improvement': avg_improvement,
64            'successful_optimizations': successful_optimizations,
65            'total_controllers': len(optimization_results)
66        }
67    }
